mapper.sql: select id, collection_id, config_id, bui_name, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from cnt_post_exist
mapper.select:
select pe.id, pe.bui_name buiname, pe.re_mark remark, co.collection_name collectionName, pc.config_name configname, pe.created_time createdtime, pe.updated_time updatedtime from cnt_post_exist pe left join cnt_collection co on pe.collection_id = co.id left join cnt_post_config pc on pe.config_id = pc.id
and pe.collection_id = #{collectionId} and pe.config_id = #{configId} and pe.bui_name like concat('%', #{buiName}, '%')
order by pe.created_time desc
